name: The Joylancer: Legendary Motor Knight
description: THE JOYLANCER: LEGENDARY MOTOR KNIGHT is a new breed of action game, combining ultra-technical action with a simple control scheme and an artstyle inspired by portable games of old! Wield the divine power of the Motor Knights and save the world!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP or above Processor: 1.4GHz processor Memory: 1.5 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 8-compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: Microsoft XBOX 360 Controller or DirectInput-compatible controller
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP or above Processor: 2GHz processor or faster Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 8-compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: Microsoft XBOX 360 Controller or DirectInput-compatible controller
